snippet: A Judaica collection will go to auction; Ballets Russes art is coming to the National Gallery of Art; and James Turrell creates art for Kayne Griffin Corcoran’s new gallery space in Los Angeles.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; Sotheby's will auction collection of Judaica amassed by New York hedge fund manager Michael Steinhardt; exhibit Diaghilev and the Ballets Russes, 1909-1929: When Art Danced With Music, opening at National Gallery of Art in Washington, chronicles relationship between dance company and contributors; artist James Turrell will design gallery for Kayne Griffin Corcoran in Los Angeles.
lead_paragraph: A Judaica collection will go to auction; Ballets Russes art is coming to the National Gallery of Art; and James Turrell creates art for Kayne Griffin Corcoran’s new gallery space in Los Angeles.

headline.seo: Judaica, Ballets Russes Art and James Turrell Works
headline.main: A Judaica Collection Heads to Auction
headline.print_headline: A Judaica Collection Heads to Auction
